title: SCOTUS Okays Sports Betting, U.S. Taking Role of Oil Exporter, CBS Takes Redstones to Court
itunes:title: SCOTUS Okays Sports Betting, U.S. Taking Role of Oil Exporter, CBS Takes Redstones to Court
description:
Carol is joined by Eben Novy-Williams, Bloomberg Sports Business Reporter, and Steve Budin,CEO at PickNation.com, on a Supreme Court decision that opens the door to legalize gambling on sporting events. Walter Zimmerman, Chief Technical Analyst at ICAP-TA, shares his outlook for oil. Paul Sweeney, Bloomberg Intelligence U.S. Director of Research, explains why CBS has filed suit to block Shari Redstone to wrest control of the media company from National Amusements. And we Drive to the Close with Willie Delwiche, Investment Strategist at Baird.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
